sentences: Ta otsis kättemaksu oma vaenlase peale.
Kättemaks võib olla nii füüsilise kui ka vaimse iseloomuga.
Pärast pikka vastasseisu leidis nad lõpuks ühiselusaluse ja loobusid kättemaksust.
context: Kättemaks is an Estonian noun meaning revenge or retaliation. It refers to the act of getting even with someone who has wronged you, often in response to harm or injustice. The word carries a sense of justice-seeking behavior and can be used for both physical and forms of retribution.
